The Financial Goal Planner is a smart personal finance application designed to help individuals and families set, track, and achieve their financial goals. Whether it is required for a house, a child’s education, a vacation, or retirement, the app provides personalized investment strategies and budgeting guidance based on your income, expenses, and risk tolerance.

 

Key features include:-

 

Goal Setting-- Define short-term and long-term goals (e.g., buy a home, save for college).

Budget Planning-- Analyze monthly income and expenses to optimize savings.

Investment Advice-- Get tailored recommendations on how and where to invest (e.g., mutual funds, stocks, SIPs) to meet your goals.

Family Planning(Optional)-- Create shared financial goals with spouse or family and track progress collaboratively.

Progress Tracker-- Visualize the progress toward each goal with charts and timelines.

Alerts & Suggestions-- Receive real-time alerts, tips, and financial insights to stay on track.

It will also track timely expenses and suggest accordingly if there is any need to increase the investment plan by modifying the investment strategy.
